CreateRouteMixCommand.title: Schema for the MixInfo of the spirent.methodology.CreateRouteMixCommand.
CreateRouteMixCommand.description: allOf doesn't inherit, but indepdently validates JSON (http://stackoverflow.com/questions/22689900/json-schema-allof-with-additionalproperties) using referenced schemas. Switched to use multiple references to keep additionalProperties false

enable.description: A flag indicating if this object should be merged into the template configuration.

routeCount.description: Total number of routes for all components in this mix

table.description: A list of components that make up the mixture.

importExpectedCount.description: The number of routes expected to be loaded when a route import (from file) is done.  If the number of routes loaded is less than the expected count (combined with the tolerance), the import will be marked as failing.

importExpectedCountTolerancePercent.description: The percent tolerance to apply to the expected imported route count to allow.  For example, if importExpectedCount is 1000 and importExpectedCountTolerancePercent is set to 10, as long as 900 routes are imported, the import will be considered successful.

weight.description: The weight of this component upon network counts.

appliedValue.description: Load actually assigned to this component.  Autocalculated, do not set.

postExpandModify.description: A list of operations that will be carried out on datamodel objects after the template is expanded.

enable.description: A flag indicating if this object should be merged into the template configuration.

bllWizardExpand.description: Process route wizard params, invoke BLL command, tag resulting routes.

targetTagList.description: List of tag names representing routers that will have routes applied onto them.

srcObjectTagName.description: Tag name that represents the loaded wizard params object.

createdRoutesTagName.description: Tag name that will be affected upon the routes that are created by the BLL wizard.

commandName.description: Name of command that will be invoked with the targetTagList, srcObjectTagName, and createdRoutesTagName.

importExpectedCount.description: Only applicable when command is BgpImportRoutesCommand. Specifies the expected number of routes to be imported per router instance.

importExpectedCountTolerancePercent.description: Only applicable when command is BgpImportRoutesCommand. Specifies the tolerance in percent for the Expected Count.
